channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Alley way Road has all crumbled away, 24th September
item.description:
Itâ€™s the alleyway between churchdown library and the Parton manor infant school. I watch children and parents trip everyday. My daughter tripped on Monday causing cuts to hands and legs and bruising to her elbow.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 24th September
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different remove x1 750x600x20mm raised slab replace with tarmac patch stats required number 3 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 24th September
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure 28 day please replace x1 broken sunken 900x600x20mm slab stats required (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet
